0.info: This picture was taken in the summer of 2017 during a visit my friend and I made to San Francisco.

1.info: The top of Half Dome in Yosemite features long cables to assist climbers up the face of the summit.

2.info: I interviewed at Google for a job around February/March 2018. While there I took this picture!

5.info: During my time at BYU I had the opportunity to give many presentations on my research. This is one of those presentations taken at Colorado State University. The display screen is broken in this photo.

6.info: Growing up in Spokane Washington has engendered a skill for trap shooting in me.
